casebody.data:
Bryant T. DENNINGS
v.
Earl R. BUTLER, Cumberland Co., and State of North Carolina. No. 362P15. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Oct. 29, 2015. Bryant T. Dennings, for Dennings, Bryant T. Robert C. Montgomery, Special Deputy Attorney General, for State of N.C. William R. West, District Attorney, for State of N.C.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Petitioner on the 27th of October 2015 in this matter for a writ of mandamus, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the Superior Court, Cumberland County:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 29th of October 2015."
